metrics.name: Throttles
metrics.documentation: How often this Lambda is throttled

metrics.name: Invocations
metrics.documentation: How often this Lambda is invoked

metrics.name: Errors
metrics.documentation: How many invocations of this Lambda fail

metrics.name: Duration
metrics.documentation: How long execution of this Lambda takes

metrics.name: UrlRequestCount
metrics.documentation: The number of requests made to this Lambda's URL

metrics.name: Url4xxCount
metrics.documentation: The number of requests that returned a 4XX HTTP status code

metrics.name: Url5xxCount
metrics.documentation: The number of requests that returned a 5XX HTTP status code

metrics.name: UrlRequestLatency
metrics.documentation: The time between the function URL receiving and responding a request
